mapper.sql: wzid, wid, wuserform_id, wname, worderto, wtype, wrepeat, wuser_id, wcreattime, waccessory, wos, wdb, wjdk, wpriority, wstatus, wmemo, wprincipal_id, wddl
mapper.select: select wid,wcreattime,urealname,cname,wpriority,wname from workorders a,user,company where user.uid in(select fuser_id from userform where userform.fid = a.wuserform_id) and user.ucompany_id = company.cid and a.wuser_id = #{cid};

distinct

from workorders
order by ${orderByClause}

from workorders
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into workorders (wzid, wid, wuserform_id, wname, worderto, wtype, wrepeat, wuser_id, wcreattime, waccessory, wos, wdb, wjdk, wpriority, wstatus, wmemo, wprincipal_id, wddl, wcontent) values (#{wzid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{wid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{wuserformId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{wname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{worderto,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wrepeat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wuserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{wcreattime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{waccessory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wos,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wdb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wjdk,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wpriority,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{wstatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{wmemo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wprincipalId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{wddl,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{wcontent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
